name: A Changeling in Time
description: Odo is in a temporal predicament! Chasing down stolen cargo, he finds himself slipping uncontrollably to different points in time, with his shapeshifting out of control. Help bring the constable safely back to the twenty-fourth century!
rules:
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Faction Missions in one phase, and Supply Missions in another phase.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Faction Missions and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Mitchell, Dehner, Odo, Antaak or Dominion Crew will provide a bonus to Faction Missions and Supply Missions.
-- Every Faction or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Mitchell, Dehner, Odo, Antaak or Dominion
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Straal
featured_crew.flavor: Exomycologist and captain of USS Glenn. Discovered the mycelial network with Paul Stamets.

action.name: Right now, we have to finish getting ready.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

adventures.name: Tracked Through Time
adventures.description: Create a device that can follow Odo's temporal location.

adventures.name: Starting the Transport
adventures.description: Help Odo assemble the parts for a pre-warp dematerializer.

adventures.name: Alternate History
adventures.description: Follow any changes Odo's presence makes to the timeline.

adventures.name: Caught in the Rift
adventures.description: Develop a transporter to bring Odo through time.

rewards.name: A Changeling in Time
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

adventures.name: Physiologic Stabilization
adventures.description: Modify a transporter beam to stabilize Odo into one form.

adventures.name: Top Shelf
adventures.description: Locate supplies that may amplify signals through time.

adventures.name: Tracked Through Time
adventures.description: Create a device that can follow Odo's temporal location.

adventures.name: Caught in the Rift
adventures.description: Develop a transporter to bring Odo through time.

rewards.name: A Changeling in Time
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

goals.flavor: Choose an ally to help rescue Odo.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

screens.text: "This is Constable Odo of Deep Space Nine. I hope this distress call might actually reach someone in the Federation. While retrieving stolen goods that were taken through the Bajoran wormhole, it appears I somehow ended up in a temporal rift."

"I don't know how it happened, but I will be paying a certain Ferengi back for my trouble on my return. The period I've landed in appears to be in the twentieth century. I lost control of my shapeshifting abilities, though the humans here seem at ease with my current appearance."

"Captain, we heard the distress call too. I'm not used to these psionic abilities, but I am managing to pick up faint traces of the Changeling throughout time. If I could manage to lock on to him, I may be able to help bring him home."

"A Changeling, stranded in the past, who has lost control of his shapeshifting abilities. This could be a fascinating research opportunity. If you could get him back to the present, Captain, I might be able to help stabilize his shapeshifting."

"This is Constable Odo of Deep Space Nine. I hope this distress call might actually reach someone in the Federation. While retrieving stolen goods that were taken through the Bajoran wormhole, it appears I somehow ended up in a temporal rift."

"I don't know how it happened, but I will be paying a certain Ferengi back for my trouble on my return. The period I've landed in appears to be in the twentieth century. I lost control of my shapeshifting abilities, though the humans here seem at ease with my current appearance."

"Captain, we heard the distress call too. I'm not used to these psionic abilities, but I am managing to pick up faint traces of the Changeling throughout time. If I could manage to lock on to him, I may be able to help bring him home."

"A Changeling, stranded in the past, who has lost control of his shapeshifting abilities. This could be a fascinating research opportunity. If you could get him back to the present, Captain, I might be able to help stabilize his shapeshifting."

"Captain, I've pinpointed the Constable's temporal location. With the knowledge you've gained, you should be able to build a temporal transporter, right? Please be quick about it. I do not know how long I can hold on his position."
"Doctor, thank you for your assistance. I'm trying to hold this form as long as I can."

responses.text: "Who were you retrieving the stolen cargo from?"

screens.text: "I'm doing the best I can, Captain, believe me. It won't be a moment too soon when I get back there. I'll throw that Ferengi in the brig for as long as the Federation will allow."
"I'll regale you with the finer details another time, Captain. For now, let's just say I've landed with a group of humans who take war far more lightly than anyone I've ever encountered."
"I'll give you three guesses and the first two don't count. I believe that's how the saying goes."
"We're ready, Captain. Please, hurry with the transporter before I lose him again!"

"Captain, I've pinpointed the Constable's temporal location. With the knowledge you've gained, you should be able to build a temporal transporter, right? Please be quick about it. I do not know how long I can hold on his position."
"Doctor, thank you for your assistance. I'm trying to hold this form as long as I can."

responses.text: "Who were you retrieving the stolen cargo from?"

screens.text: "I'm doing the best I can, Captain, believe me. It won't be a moment too soon when I get back there. I'll throw that Ferengi in the brig for as long as the Federation will allow."
"I'll regale you with the finer details another time, Captain. For now, let's just say I've landed with a group of humans who take war far more lightly than anyone I've ever encountered."
"I'll give you three guesses and the first two don't count. I believe that's how the saying goes."
"We're ready, Captain. Please, hurry with the transporter before I lose him again!"
